item.title: Watch Symfony Framework Support in NetBeans IDE 6.8
item.dc:creator: Karim Cassam ChenaÃ¯
item.content:encoded:
Un video montrant l'integration de Symfony a l'IDE NetBeans (un equivalent de Eclipse en plus simple).

Symfony Framework Support in NetBeans IDE 6.8

Video:
This screencast demonstrates the built-in support for the Symfony framework in NetBeans IDE for PHP 6.8. It shows how to set up the IDE to use Symfony, how to create a PHP project that uses the Symfony framework, and a number of tips. - 10/19/09
http://link.brightcove.com/services/player/bcpid1640183659?bclid=0&bctid=4509...
